title: Food Security Navigator
description: AI-powered tool that identifies food deserts and recommends targeted interventions like farmers markets or food pantries based on zip codeâ€“level data. It serves both policymakers and residents by providing localized insights, nearby resources, and downloadable maps to support equitable access to nutritious food.

title: Face Stylizer
description: AI-powered tool that transforms user photos into stylized portraits using advanced generative models like JoJoGAN and StyleGAN. By leveraging one-shot style transfer, it produces high-resolution, anime-inspired images that push the boundaries of creative AI.

title: Agent Checklists: Intent Recognition
description: AI/ML project that uses natural language processing to predict the intent behind user chat inquiries and recommend the correct workflow for customer service agents. Trained on over 10,000 human-to-human dialogues, our model achieved 88% accuracy using logistic regression, outperforming other tested approaches
